title: Engineering Recruitment
info:
Stem Skills & Recruitment is a specialist engineering recruitment agency with a proven track record of providing engineering professionals for a variety of businesses in South Wales. Our approach to recruitment is simple but that of care, integrity, attention to detail, and solutions that make a genuine difference: short-term and long-term.

 As engineering recruitment specialists, we recruit for a wide range of permanent roles, from graduate recruitment to senior & executive recruitment. These are within various engineering settings including manufacturing, automotive, aerospace, graduates, food, FMCG, oil & gas, chemical, materials, electronics and compound semiconductors. We provide expertise in recruiting for the following engineering jobs:
